content: Accessory dwelling units are permitted in single-family residential zones after zoning clearance. Maximum size is 800 square feet or 40% of primary dwelling floor area, whichever is less.
A building permit is required for structural work, electrical rewiring, new plumbing lines, and any project valued above $5,000. Cosmetic painting and finish replacement do not require a permit.

section: ยง 9.14 Notice of Rent Increase
content: Landlords must provide written notice at least 30 days before a rent increase of up to 10%. Increases greater than 10% require at least 90 days written notice.
Home occupation businesses are allowed with a business license if customer visits are limited to 8 per day and no exterior storage or signage is installed.
Any placement of dumpsters, scaffolding, or storage containers in the public right-of-way requires a temporary encroachment permit issued by Public Works before placement.
